text: Mark Boal (born January 23, 1973) is an American journalist, screenwriter and film producer. Boal won 2 Academy Awards in 2009 for The Hurt Locker in the categories of Best Writing (Original Screenplay) and Best Picture. ==Filmography== *The Hurt Locker (screenplay, producer) (2009) *In the Valley of Elah (based on story by Boal and Paul Haggis) (2007) Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Academy Award winning writers Category:BAFTA Award winning writers Category:Journalists from New York City Category:Movie producers from New York City Category:Screenwriters from New York City
